notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interests.

notes.title: Ethical approval
notes.p: Ethical approval was granted by the UFBA research ethics board (IRB number 2.326.141). All participants read and signed an informed consent.

notes.title: Research involving human participants
notes.p: Sampling of human sera was approved by the responsible research ethics board of the Federal University of Bahia (IRB Number 2.326.141).

notes.title: Informed consent
notes.p: All study participants read and signed informed consent.
